00027 class Sensor {
00028   public:
00029     friend class SensorManager;
00030 
00031     ~Sensor();
00032 
00033     // Return maximum range of the sensor in the sensor's unit.
00034     float getMaximumRange() const;
00035 
00036     // Return name string of the sensor.
00037     base::String getName() const;
00038 
00039     // Return the power in mA used by this sensor while in use
00040     float getPower() const;
00041 
00042     // Return resolution of the sensor in the sensor's unit.
00043     float getResolution() const;
00044 
00045     // Return the minimum delay allowed between two events in microsecond
00046     // or zero if this sensor only returns a value when the data it's measuring
00047     // changes.
00048     int32_t getMinDelay() const;
00049 
00050     // Return generic type of this sensor.
00051     SensorManager::SensorType getType() const;
00052 
00053     // Return vendor string of this sensor.
00054     base::String getVendor() const;
00055 
00056     // Return version of the sensor's module.
00057     int32_t getVersion() const;
00058 
00060     COS_LOCAL int32_t getHandle() const;
00061 
00062     COS_LOCAL void setRange(float max, float res);
00065   private:
